 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֻרְיָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==manger, crib== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אוּדְיָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLgAYAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAuABgAAAJ2jI+py+0Po5wKgHqpDjafvlhbKCadZ4AmCp0kq36ldLIpPKccBdocDsQ0ciYMzjgi/lA+XdKnZDQf0ZjDtao2o1lr7fhq1WTLGfcGlsXM7KHXWibLf+7eGPFmzo1fOLHvcSYCmMWXIzhVVFeINBIh6EgTOdlQAAA7">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhHgAjAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAeACMAAAJnjI+pywgNF5gzukarDVpmS0Hf42QdxoXlGZkJub1gTLM0Y99Krpe9AfPpPq+gbEcUSpAi4+Uowhldh44TOKWmqlLPSZPjcaBN2ENVvRZNNvE6qfwV5V76Sn2D2534Hnr/t2c3SKhQAAA7"> ***stall***, etc., Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***manager*** Mohit<sup>19. 15</sup> (GFM, privately), compare Lane<sup>51c</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***urû***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>BAS i. 211</sup>) — ***Plural*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֻרָוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.32.28|2Chr 32:28]] (Aramaic form for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֳרָוֺת‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 172</sup>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֻרְוֺת‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.6|1Kgs 5:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ֻארְיוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.9.25|2Chr 9:25]] ***crib*** of horses [[1Kgs.5.6|1Kgs 5:6]] (app. in enumeration horses themselves, English ***head***, or ***span***, compare also [[2Chr.9.25|2Chr 9:25]] with [[1Kgs.10.26|1Kgs 10:26]] So [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#MV|MV]], but text here dubious. compare [[BDB#Klo|Klo]]), hence [[2Chr.9.25|2Chr 9:25]] of any animals (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלבֿהמה‎</span>) [[2Chr.32.28|2Chr 32:28]] (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַאֲ‎</span> see Add.). **\*\***Also plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲוֵרוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.32.28|2Chr 32:28]]b (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעֲדָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵐ5‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ9‎</span> Kit Benz and others).
